name: Escape of The Hammer Princess
summary: A retro-styled rampage in both 3D and 2D! After years of waiting to be rescued, the Princess has decided to rescue herself. Escape as the princess in exciting retro-styled 3D, and relive the deaths of her would-be rescuers in classic 8-bit 2D! Bash some Skulls, Break Stuff, and Rise as a Legend!
